explains: adj. 限制（性）的，约束（性）的；（语法） 限定性的

sentences.en: The other reason why costs are so high is the restrictive guild-like ownership structure of the business.
sentences.cn: 成本如此之高的另一个原因是行业协会具有约束性的所有权结构等限制性因素。

sentences.en: With such restrictive conditions attached to government aid, the bank is doing its best to wriggle out from under it.
sentences.cn: 在政府资助所附带的限制性条件下，该银行现在不得不想法设法摆脱它的影响。

sentences.en: The state will adopt a more restrictive policy on arms sales.
sentences.cn: 这个州将对武器销售采取一项更具约束性的政策。
